invite_options.reason: the bot's purpose is to index servers and give invites on a random basis. if you do not want this, please remove the bot from the guild.

helpers.name: about_command_reply
helpers.data:
hi there. i'm the bot for indexing servers
i was designed by **bin#9095**. i was made in under 48 hours and i am open source, avaliable at <https://github.com/binsenpai/the_bot/>.
i am very efficient and help users looking for random servers.

please do not exploit me. i am not very friendly to exploiters >:(

you can join my support server here: https://discord.gg/8xrYHK7

- the bot | created by bin. <https://bin.moe> | use **tb!help** -

helpers.name: help_command_reply
helpers.data:
hi there. my commands include:
 - **tb!help** | show's this. commands of the bot.
 - **tb!about** | show's information about the bot's purpose and support server.
 - **tb!stats** | display's statistics of the bot.
 - **tb!random** | the core command. give's the invite of a random server.

you may invite me using <https://bin.moe/the-invite>
my commands do have aliases, you may find them on the github repository or central server.

- the bot | created by bin. <https://bin.moe> | **use tb!help** -

helpers.name: stats_command_template
helpers.data:
hi, here are my stats:
 - **$_MEMBER_COUNT_$** users.
 - **$_GUILD_COUNT_$** servers.
 - **$_COMMAND_COUNT_$** invites delivered.

up for **$_UPTIME_$**

- the bot | created by bin. <http://bin.moe/> | use **tb!help** -
